Agreement on Cooperation between DPRK and Syrian Children's Organizations Signed 
   Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- An agreement on friendship and cooperation between the Korean Children's Union of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League and the Syria Baath Children Organization was signed at the Mansudae Assembly Hall Monday.
 Present at the signing ceremony from the DPRK side were Kim Kyong Ho, first secretary of the C.C., the youth league, and officials concerned and from the Syrian side members of the Syria Baath Children Organization delegation headed by Chairman Ahmad Abou Musa and Syrian Charge d'Affaires ad Interim here Muhammad Adib Al Hani.    
 The agreement was inked by Kim Kyong Ho and Ahmad Abou Musa.

articles.content:
Greetings to Djiboutian President
   Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Tuesday sent a message of greetings to Ismail Omar Guelleh, president of the Republic of Djibouti, on the occasion of the 29th anniversary of its independence.
 Expressing the belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would grow stronger in the future, the message wished the Djiboutian president and government greater successes in the work for consolidating national unity and the country's progress and prosperity.

articles.content:
INCB delegation Arrives
   Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the International Narcotics Control Board led by former President Hamid Ghodse arrived here Tuesday.
 The DPRK government hosted a reception in honor of the delegation in the evening.

Supreme Commander of KPA Sends Wreath to Bier of O Mi Ran
   Pyongyang, June 27 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il sent a wreath to the bier of O Mi Ran, winner of Kim Il Sung Prize and people's artiste of the April 25 Film Studio of the KPA, on June 27 expressing deep condolences over her death.
